name: DiGiTIAL THUNDER Drum Kit File
summary: Learn about .DKT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The Drum Station software was last updated in 2005.

description: File used by d-lusion Drum Station, a program used for generating drum kit beats and sounds; saves drum sounds for a certain drum kit type (written "DRUM KiT"), such as rock or jazz; allows the specific configuration to be saved and shared.
